about_the_game:
Experience RunOut—the ultimate party game for up to 6 players. Choose a cute character with unique abilities, race through unpredictable stages, and fight for the coveted stuffed bear.

Race, fight, and party

Join up to 6 players in a solo match or form teams for 3v3 action. Stay alive through the match, smash your friends to the ground, and gather as many bears and coins as possible to claim the ultimate victory!

Surprise mini-games

Take on a variety of stages and gameplay styles to gain an edge at different points in the game. Be ready for surprise mini-games, such as Falling Box, Safe Zone, Piñata, Hardcore Punch, and Last Man Standing. Mastering them will be the key to your victory.

Live and interactive stages

A constantly moving screen will push you, so make sure to act fast! Levels contain traps, that can ruin your day, and power-ups, that can help you outrun and outgun your opponents. Find hidden switches that will either help you out or create chaotic obstacles for everyone!

Camera-switch your way to victory

Switch between 3rd person and full-camera view, adapting to each situation and getting the best of both worlds: precision-moving on full-camera view and the huge field-of-view of 3rd person. Master the camera-switching and get the edge on your opponents!

Unique characters, unique skills

Look through all the cute animals available, choose your favorite one, pick a cool outfit for them, and compete for the number one spot! Each animal has a unique skill to help you win: eat them, scream in their ear, or just stomp them! Use it to your advantage and overcome the fierce competition.

name: RunOut - Hothead Paws

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 560 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or AMD R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or better or AMD FX-8120 @ 3.1 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD RX590
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card 5.1 with latest drivers

short_description: ‘RunOut’ is an online party platformer game for 2 to 6 players! Pick a cute animal character, race through unpredictable obstacle courses, collect coins, and be the first to grab the stuffed bear. Prepare for a fun, fast-paced mix of running, fighting, and partying!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Dutch, Indonesian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Vietnamese
